s: Great product for tailgating and concerts. Bought more for my kids- they love them too. Red Rocks here we come!! ... I bought this as a chair to put insode of my tent for when I'm in the Boundary Waters or backing. It works well but it's quite large. I've owned others that were maybe an inch or two shorter in L and W. But I'd recommend this as I know not everyone is using it for my intended use. ... New to the Crazy Creek ...
